work.title: Internship - Web developer
work.desc: This internship lasted 3 months. I had to redesign and develop a showcase site, to design a social network on the web app and to start its implementation.

work.title: Internship - Mobile developer
work.desc: This internship lasted 2 months. My mission was mainly to install a multilingual system on the mobile application and to organize the data to be translated. I also conducted functional tests.

work.title: Internship - OPEX assistant
work.desc: This internship lasted 5 months, I was part of Operational Excellence and its IT support. I was mainly responding to tickets from school employees and creating automation scripts.

work.title: Internship - Product Owner
work.desc: The internship lasted 1 month. I discovered the product owner and salesman missions, I performed several functional tests on new features and participated in the evolution of the web app.

work.title: Permanent contract - Educational module manager
work.desc: I was responsible for the Coding Club as well as the Epitech Diversity department within the school's national management. My main mission was to set up activities to reduce the digital divide.

work.title: Freelance — Web development trainer
work.desc: As a freelancer, I provide courses and practical work on web development for FORMAWAVE's client training organisations.

education.diploma: Skills upgrade classe for applied arts (MANAA)
education.name: CIFACOM
education.desc: Class preparing for the Graphic Design and Visual Communication course in the same school.

education.name: Epitech
education.desc: Education is mainly focused on project-based teaching. During the third year, the final project begins.

education.name: Keimyung University
education.desc: University exchange for 1 year. Integrated in the video game development department, I was able to discover Korean culture, 3D modeling and to learn how to use Unity.

education.name: Epitech
education.desc: The period includes the study year abroad. The final project of my group of 10 students, Contra Legem, is an artificial intelligence that summarizes contracts.

university.title: 1ère année
university.desc: La première année de BUT Informatique est une année d'initiation aux bases de l'informatique. Les étudiants apprennent les bases de la programmation, de la gestion de projet et de la communication.

projects.title: Jeu du jeton en Java
projects.descShort:
Le jeu du jeton en Java, jeu de plateau qui se joue a deux.

Chaque joueur commence la partie avec 10 jetons, et doit les placer sur le plateau de 21 cases. Chaque pion a une valeur, le pion 1 vaut 1 point, le pion 2 en vaut 2, etc. Une fois que les 2 joueurs ont placés leurs 10 pions, il reste une case vide. Celui qui remporte la partie est le joueur qui a le moins de points autour de la case vide.

content.title: POO
content.desc: Programmation orientée objet, utilisée pour la création des classes et des objets du jeu.

competences.title: Java
competences.desc: Langage de programmation orienté objet, utilisé pour le développement de la logique du jeu.

competences.desc: Bibliothèque graphique de Java, utilisée pour la création de l'interface graphique du jeu.

projects.descFull: Le jeu du jeton en Java est un jeu de plateau qui se joue à deux. Chaque joueur commence la partie avec 10 jetons, et doit les placer sur le plateau de 21 cases. Chaque pion a une valeur, le pion 1 vaut 1 point, le pion 2 en vaut 2, etc. Une fois que les 2 joueurs ont placé leurs 10 pions, il reste une case vide. Celui qui remporte la partie est le joueur qui a le moins de points autour de la case vide.
